name: BattleFarm: Bullet Season
description:
In this farming simulation/bullet hell, use your trustworthy farm to survive the war you did not sign up for!

Use WASD/Arrow Keys to move.

Press 1/2/3 to change your item.

Press Space to plant your item.

Press E to eat your grown items and regain health.

Be smart with what you plant! Corn is your most balanced item with a great growth rate. Sunflowers heal you for more but are very fragile. Watermelons can tank a lot of bullets but have a slow growth rate.
